articles.title: Tourist filmed carving fiance’s name into The Colosseum in Rome
articles.description: ‘I consider it very serious, unworthy and a sign of great incivility.’
articles.content:
A tourist has been filmed carving his fiance’s name into The Colosseum in Rome.

articles.title: The Italian Air Force Celebrates Its Centenary In 'Grande' Style
articles.description: Last week at Pratica di Mare airport, near Rome, the most awaited event for the centenary of the Italian Air Force took place.
articles.content:
Celebrations for the centenary of the Italian Air Force were held at Mario De Bernardi military airport, attracting over 200,000 visitors.
The event featured displays of aircraft from the past and present, including a performance by the Frecce Tricol... [5703 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Rare find of 24 ancient bronzes in Tuscany goes on display in Rome
articles.description: Statues were unearthed last year in what was a place of worship for both the Etruscans and Romans
articles.content:
A trove of bronze statues buried by mud and boiling water for thousands of years before being found in the ruins of a network of ancient thermal springs in a small town in Tuscany are going on display in Rome.

articles.title: Pope short of breath, says he’s still feeling effects of anesthesia 2 weeks after surgery
articles.description: ROME (AP) — Pope Francis said Thursday he was short of breath and still feeling the effects of anesthesia from abdominal surgery two weeks ago.
